# performClick(_:)

**Instance Method**

Simulates a single mouse click on the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func performClick(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The object requesting the action. This parameter is ignored.

## Discussion

This method calls the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCell/performClick(_:)] method of the receiver’s cell with the sender being the control itself. This method raises an exception if the action message cannot be successfully sent.

## Activating from the Keyboard

- **refusesFirstResponder**: A Boolean value indicating whether the receiver refuses the first responder role.
